title: Jinrou Game: Lost Eden
overview: 10 high school students who are in the same class get caught and forced to play The Werewolf game, where they have to kill each others to survive.This is set in the same universe as all the other "Jinrou Game" movies that came before and after, but feature different students. Only movie that has more direct ties to this drama is "Jinrou Game: Inferno" (2018). All the movies were initially theatrical releases.
